input.name: data
input.description: The datatable containing the columns to compare.

input.name: columns
input.description: The list of columns to be compared.

input.name: case sensitive
input.description:
Whether lowercase and uppercase letters should be treated as equivalent.
If unspecified, defaults to `False` (Lowercase and Uppercase letters are treated as equivalent).

output.name: same
output.description: A datatable containing rows which have the same values in selected columns.

output.name: different
output.description: A datatable containing rows which have different values in selected columns.
